DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate anti-atherosclerotic action natural drug Karinat base phytoestrogen-rich botanical postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Anti-atherosclerotic Activity Karinat Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Women least 5 year menopause Maximum intimamedia thickness common carotid artery 0,80 mm ( ultrasonographic Bmode examination ) The absence climacteric syndrome ( le 3 point BlattKupperman scale ) The absence chronic disease demand permanent drug administration ( 2 month per year ) The absence hypolipidemic therapy hormone replacement therapy 6 month inclusion Administration lipidlowering drug , and/or hormone replacement therapy , and/or phytoestrogens 6 month inclusion Continuous administration sulfonylurea derivative , and/or betablockers , and/or calcium antagonist ( 2 month per year ) Personal history diagnostic following disease : 1 . Personal history stroke , coronary heart disease , acute myocardial infarction transient ischemic attack 2 . Pulmonary thromboembolism 3 . Chronic heart failure IIaIII 4 . Uncontrolled arterial hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 145 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg hypotensive therapy ) 5 . Malignancy 6 . Chronic renal failure IIIII 7 . Chronic hepatic failure IIIII 8 . Liver cirrhosis 9 . Individual intolerance Karinat major side effect
